Dear Prof. Goodwin,
I have a general question about the reactor-class. The =
set of governing 
equations you review briefly in the "cantera-introduction=
.pdf" contains 
an internal energy balance equation. Therefore you need to =
solve every 
time step an implicit formulation to derive the temperature. W=
hat is 
the reason you don't transform it in an equation with temperature a=
s 
the independent variable? Thank you very much.

Best Regards 
         A=
lbrecht Heinzel
